episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_0100:
Are those the costumes for the star festival? They
suit both of you.
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_0300:
We have to make the star festival a success for all
the people looking forward to it.
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_0500:
But if so, are you sure you should be leisurely
watching the stars with me? Are you not busy?
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_0600: Not at all! This is very important, too!
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_0700:
We used to help out at the Mossdeep Space
Center in Hoenn.
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_0800:
We were already curious about space and stars
from before, but...
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_0900:
We just thought we should study more for the
star festival!
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_1000: OK! If that’s the case, let’s get the lesson started!
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_1100:
When you look up at the sky and wish, the stars
will quietly shine. ♪
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_1200:
If you wish upon the stars, tomorrow
shines bright. ♪
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_1400: It’s the song we’re gonna sing at the star festival!
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_1500:
We’re practicing it every day so we can sing it
while dancing!
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_1600: I see...it’s very nice! Can I hear the rest?
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_1700:
You two can be the teachers this time, and help
me learn this song!
episode_event_summer_2023/4001_1001_1900: I’m gonna sing it slowly, OK? One, two...
episode_event_summer_2023/6801_1031_0100:
I hope everyone’s wishes
come true!
episode_event_summer_2023/6801_1001_0100:
Have you decided what you’re wishing for at the
star festival, Liza?
episode_event_summer_2023/6801_1001_0200:
Yup! I won’t tell you, though! Have you
decided, Tate?
episode_event_summer_2023/6801_1001_0300:
I don’t need to make a wish—mine’s already
come true!
episode_event_summer_2023/4002_1001_0200: Yup! Shall we start our dance practice?
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_0500:
When it wakes up from its long sleep, it can make
any wish come true.
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_0800:
Yeah... But as you can see, it’s still asleep
right now.
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_0900:
Could we keep this a secret and just leave
it alone?
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_1000:
If word gets out about Jirachi, people will show
up by the boatload to try n’ use its power…
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_1100:
People’s greed knows no bounds. Once one wish
comes true, there’ll be another wish they want
to make.
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_1200:
Pokémon should never suffer because of
human egos...
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_1400: We won’t tell anyone about Jirachi!
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_1500: It wouldn’t be nice to interrupt Jirachi’s nap!
episode_event_summer_2023/4003_1001_1800:
How nice would it be if everyone had a kind heart
like them...
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_0200:
We were looking for you, you know? We have to
protect you kids.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_0400:
Yes. We cannot have anything happen to the stars
of the star festival.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_0500: We will stay with you until the star festival ends.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_0700: I did ask if we really needed to protect you two.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_0800:
Especially because I heard you two were skilled
Trainers. Even stronger when together.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_0900:
Well, we did hear Ultra Wormholes are opening
more actively recently...
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_1000:
It is better than being one step behind when
something happens.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_1300:
An Ultra Wormhole is just like a door between
here and another world.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_1400:
Both of you might have seen Ultra Beasts, the
Pokémon from other worlds, on Pasio.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_1500:
Yup, I know them! Those Pokémon that
look a bit different from others!
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_1600: We saw Looker searching for them before.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_1800:
Apparently he’s following a case with head
detective Emma.
episode_event_summer_2023/4004_1001_1900: I see...I guess they’re busy too.
episode_event_summer_2023/4005_1001_0200:
You improved quite significantly. Your dancing is
basically perfect, no?
episode_event_summer_2023/4005_1001_0300:
Hehe! I guess we’ll have to see if I can
synchronize well with Tate!
episode_event_summer_2023/4005_1001_0400: That shouldn’t be a problem for you two.
episode_event_summer_2023/4005_1001_0500: It’s almost time to meet up with Tate and Nanu—
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_0200: Is that the little scamp from Mossdeep?
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_0600:
I can’t find Liza anywhere, and I can’t get in touch
with her!
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_0800:
Anabel should have been with her, but I can’t
get in touch with her either.
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_0900:
Only their partner Pokémon were at the
meeting point.
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_1200:
Cheer up, kiddo! I’ll help you search, too! It’s
gonna be all right!
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_1400:
This is an odd situation. I have a million guesses
about what bad guys would go after the
Pokémon, but...
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_1500:
Real weird for the Trainer to be missing and the
Pokémon to be left behind.
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_1600:
Maybe they went to the other side of an
Ultra Wormhole...
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_1700:
Whoa, whoa! Are you saying the kid and that lady
cop have been sent to another world?!
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_1900:
I’m saying maybe. It would explain why I can’t
contact her.
episode_event_summer_2023/4006_1001_2000:
If there’s a chance that Ultra Wormholes are
involved, we need to talk to the expert...
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_0100:
We can definitely see traces that an Ultra
Wormhole appeared here.
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_0400: Hey! How can we save those two?!
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_0500:
At this stage, we don’t have enough clues to help
us locate the world that they were sent to.
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_0600:
This is a different situation from when you and
Mr. Guzma jumped into the Ultra Wormhole on
Alola, right?
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_0800:
Necrozma and Lunala can open Ultra Wormholes
on their own, but...
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_0900:
We cannot just open Ultra Wormholes one by one
without any idea of where Liza and Anabel are.
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_1000:
We don’t know what would happen...or what kind
of Ultra Beasts there would be.
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_1100: We can’t expose Pasio to danger.
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_1200: So that means...I’ll never see Liza again?
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_1500:
Don’t be givin’ up now, Tate! We’ve still got
an option.
episode_event_summer_2023/4007_1001_1900:
From here on out, this is between me and Tate—
and it’s top secret!
episode_event_summer_2023/4008_1001_0100: There’s no sign of people at all...
episode_event_summer_2023/4008_1001_0200:
This looks similar to Pasio, but it seems to be a
completely different world.
episode_event_summer_2023/4008_1001_0400:
Don’t worry. I’ll protect you no matter what
happens, Liza!
episode_event_summer_2023/4008_1001_0500:
(Having said that… It’s going to be very hard to
do that in the current situation, without
our Pokémon...)
episode_event_summer_2023/4008_1001_0600:
(But on Pasio, there are Pokémon with the power
to open Ultra Wormholes!)
episode_event_summer_2023/4008_1001_0700:
(If only there was some way for us to let them
know our location...)
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_0400:
This Pokémon’s name is UB-04—no, actually, it’s
called Celesteela.
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_0600:
This Ultra Beast shouldn’t be in a place like this,
based on recent research.
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_0700: Were you sad because you were all alone?
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_1100: Liza, be careful! This one looks hostile!
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_1300: Thank you, Celesteela! You’re so strong!
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_1500:
Haha... Very hard to read what it’s thinking, as
expected from a Pokémon from another world.
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_1600:
Although, something is off. Same for those
Ultra Beasts and Celesteela...
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_1700:
They’re in a completely different place from where
they usually live.
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_1800: Maybe they wandered in here, just like us...
episode_event_summer_2023/4009_1001_2000:
Yes. There might be an Ultra Wormhole that leads
to somewhere else.
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_0100: There’s a legend of Jirachi that goes like this:
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_0200:
Jirachi will awaken from its sleep of a thousand
years if you sing to it in a voice of purity.
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_0300: It is said to make true any wish that people desire.
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_0400:
Tate...if you really want to find Liza, I think
Jirachi will respond.
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_0600: You said you wanted to leave Jirachi alone...
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_0800: If Jirachi refuses, I won’t force it to do anything.
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_0900:
But if Jirachi itself wants to help, that’s a
different story!
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_1000: So basically, it’s up to you, Tate!
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_1100:
First we’ll see if you’re able to sing a song that
wakes Jirachi...
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_1200: And then we see if your wish is sincere!
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_1300: Thank you for giving me a chance, Archie.
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_1400: I practiced so much with Liza. I’ll try and sing!
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_1500:
When you look up at the sky and wish, the stars
will quietly shine. ♪
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_1600:
If you wish upon the stars, tomorrow
shines bright... ♪
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_1800: Oh, my heart that used to be lonely... ♪
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_2200: Go ahead, say your wish. Jirachi’s waiting for you.
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_2400:
Please, Jirachi! Bring Liza and Anabel back
to Pasio!
episode_event_summer_2023/4010_1001_2500:
I can’t stand the thought of never seeing
Liza again!
episode_event_summer_2023/4011_1001_0300: What? Singing? I can’t hear anything...
episode_event_summer_2023/4012_1001_0100: I can hear Tate singing from over there!
episode_event_summer_2023/4012_1001_0200: (The twins have a very strong connection...)
episode_event_summer_2023/4012_1001_0300:
(Maybe that Ultra Wormhole leads to our
original world?)
episode_event_summer_2023/4012_1001_0400: Celesteela! Can you fly us to that Ultra Wormhole?
episode_event_summer_2023/4012_1001_0600: Just go zoom, and then go brrr!
episode_event_summer_2023/4012_1001_0800: Anabel! Hurry up and grab onto Celesteela!
episode_event_summer_2023/4012_1001_0900: We’re gonna fly towards the sky!
episode_event_summer_2023/4013_1001_0800:
Yup! Anabel was with me, and Celesteela
protected us too!
episode_event_summer_2023/4013_1001_1000:
Thank you, Jirachi! Because of you, I got to see
Liza again!
episode_event_summer_2023/4013_1001_1200:
Yup, that’s right! In order to find you two,
Archie suggested...
episode_event_summer_2023/4013_1001_1300: Happy for you two, Tate, Liza...
episode_event_summer_2023/4013_1001_1400: I’ll leave the rest to you, copper.
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_0200:
I’m sorry I couldn’t help when something so serious
was going on...
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_0400:
We came back safe, and we made some new
friends too!
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_0500:
Also, we practiced our singing and dancing
even more!
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_0600: Let’s make it a fun star festival with everyone!
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_0700:
Yeah, that’s right! I’ll do my best to liven it
up, too!
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_0800: It seems Jirachi has met a nice Trainer.
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_1100:
I’ve heard you’re supposed to wish upon a star at
the star festival event.
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_1400: I’m pretty sure it’s the same as you.
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_1500: Hahaha! Didn’t need to ask, did I?
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_1600:
(I hope when those kiddos grow up, and even
after that...)
episode_event_summer_2023/4014_1001_1700:
(People and Pokémon in the world can carry on
laughing with each other like this. That’s all I
wish for.)
